entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.0°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
